name: LDRize Tumblr Dashboard-xPaVer-20130123
description:
An updated version of the following style:

Tumblr Dashboard x2をLDRizeとMinibufferに対応させたものです。 
http://userstyles.org/styles/16948/ldrize-minibuffer-on-tumblr-dashboard-x2

Adapted for the current tumblr configuration.  Warning, this style update requires a resolution of at least 1600x900
